com.st.st25sdk.type5

Class STType5MultiAreaTag

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.st.st25sdk.NFCTag
      • com.st.st25sdk.type5.Type5Tag
        • com.st.st25sdk.type5.STType5Tag
          • com.st.st25sdk.type5.STType5MultiAreaTag
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CacheInterface, CCFileInterface, NdefCommandInterface, MultiAreaInterface, SysFileInterface, STType5PasswordInterface
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ST25DVPwmTag, ST25DVTag, ST25TVTag

    public abstract class STType5MultiAreaTag
extends STType5Tag
implements MultiAreaInterface, STType5PasswordInterface
    Defines methods to handle a STMicroelectronics Type5 multi-area tag

      • writeNdefMessage

        public void writeNdefMessage(NDEFMsg msg,
                             byte flag)
                      throws STException
        Description copied from class: Type5Tag
        Write a NDEF message. This command may rewrite the CCFile if some inconsistencies are found.
        Overrides:
        writeNdefMessage in class Type5Tag
        Parameters:
        msg - NDEF Message to write, must not be null
        flag - The ISO15693 Request flag
        Throws:
        STException - - STExceptionCode.INVALID_DATA_PARAM if msg parameter is null - STExceptionCode.INVALID_CCFILE if the CCFile does not follow the ISO rules - STExceptionCode.INVALID_NDEF_DATA if the NDEF data fields are not formatted correctly - STExceptionCode.NDEF_MESSAGE_TOO_BIG if the message length does not fit in the tag's memory

      • writeNdefMessage

        public void writeNdefMessage(NDEFMsg msg,
                             boolean updateCCFile)
                      throws STException
        Description copied from class: Type5Tag
        Write a NDEF message.
        Overrides:
        writeNdefMessage in class Type5Tag
        Parameters:
        msg - NDEF Message to write, must not be null
        updateCCFile - Set to true to automatically overwrite the existing CCFile in case of inconsistency. Set to false to leave the CCFile untouched.
        Throws:
        STException - - STExceptionCode.INVALID_DATA_PARAM if msg parameter is null - STExceptionCode.INVALID_CCFILE if the CCFile does not follow the ISO rules - STExceptionCode.INVALID_NDEF_DATA if the NDEF data fields are not formatted correctly - STExceptionCode.NDEF_MESSAGE_TOO_BIG if the message length does not fit in the tag's memory

      • writeNdefMessage

        public void writeNdefMessage(NDEFMsg msg,
                             byte flag,
                             boolean updateCCFile)
                      throws STException
        Description copied from class: Type5Tag
        Write a NDEF message with specified flags.
        Overrides:
        writeNdefMessage in class Type5Tag
        Parameters:
        msg - NDEF Message to write, must not be null
        flag - The ISO15693 Request flag
        updateCCFile - Set to true to automatically overwrite the existing CCFile in case of inconsistency. Set to false to leave the CCFile untouched.
        Throws:
        STException - - STExceptionCode.INVALID_DATA_PARAM if msg parameter is null - STExceptionCode.INVALID_CCFILE if the CCFile does not follow the ISO rules - STExceptionCode.INVALID_NDEF_DATA if the NDEF data fields are not formatted correctly - STExceptionCode.NDEF_MESSAGE_TOO_BIG if the message length does not fit in the tag's memory
